column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Unalaq says : " Congratulations , everyone .
#Text=Freeing Vaatu wo n't make you powerful , it will only make you a traitor to everything good that 's happened over the last ten thousand years .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You think what Avatar Wan did was good ?
#Text=Driving almost all the spirits from this world ?
#Text=The Avatar has n't brought balance , only chaos .
#Text=You call yourself the bridge between the two worlds , but there should n't be a bridge : we should live together as one .
#Text=" Korra says : " Even if Vaatu escapes , I 'll put him right back in his prison , just like Wan did .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " It 's true that when Wan fused with Raava he tipped the scales in her favor , but this time I 'll be here to level the playing field .
#Text=When Harmonic Convergence comes , I will fuse with Vaatu , and together we will become the new Avatar : a Dark Avatar .
#Text=Your era is over .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Think about what you 're doing .
#Text=I know that you 've always had a deep connection with the spirits , but you 're still a man .
#Text=You 're still my brother , you 're Eska and Desna 's father .
#Text=Are you willing to throw your humanity away to become a monster ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I 'll be no more of a monster than your own daughter .
#Text=The only difference is that while she can barely recognize her own spiritual power , I will be in complete alignment with mine .
#Text=Vaatu and I will be as one .
#Text=No one will be able to stand against us .
#Text=Keep them locked up .
#Text=After the Harmonic Convergence , I will come for Korra .
#Text=" Eska says : " Yes , Father .
#Text="
